m0.description: Hiptoss: Attack: +Cerebral + 2 vs. Fortitude  :::  Damage: 1d6 + Cerebral  ::: Location: Grapple

m1.description: Big Chop: Attack: +Power + 2 vs. Will  :::  Damage: 1d8 + Power ::: Location: Grapple
m1.commentary: It dont matter how hard it hurts, as long as it hurts!

m2.description: Suplex: Attack: +Heart vs. Reflex  :::  Damage: 1d10 + Heart ::: Location: Grapple
m2.commentary: No matter how tough your opponent is, that's got to hurt!

m3.description: DDT: Attack: +Hardness + 2 vs. Toughness  :::  Damage: 1d8 + Hardness ::: Location: Grapple
m3.commentary: One of the most bone-shattering moves in history!

m4.description: Bulldog: Attack: +Hardness + 2 vs. Toughness  :::  Damage: 1d8 + Hardness ::: Location: Ropes
m4.commentary: A crunching attack.  That's bound to ring your bell!

m5.description: Big Boot: Attack: +Charisma + 2 vs. Reflex  :::  Damage: 1d6 + Charisma ::: Location: Grapple
m5.commentary: That one stung.  It keeps on stinging.

m6.description: Dropkick: Attack: +Cerebral + 2 vs. Will  :::  Damage: 1d6 + Cerebral ::: Location: Ropes

m7.description: Piledriver: Attack: +Hardness vs. Toughness  :::  Damage: 1d10 + Hardness ::: Location: Grapple
m7.commentary: That move has been outlawed for years!

m8.description: Corner Bulldog: Attack: +Hardness + 2 vs. Toughness  :::  Damage: 1d12 + Hardness ::: Location: Ropes ::: Recharge
m8.commentary: It's painful enough the regular way!

m9.description: Crossbody Block: Attack: +Cerebral vs. Fortitude  :::  Damage: 2d6 + Cerebral ::: Location: Ropes ::: Recharge

m10.description: Tombstone Piledriver: Attack: +Power vs. Toughness  :::  Damage: 3d6 + Power ::: Location: Grapple ::: Recharge
m10.commentary: He put him in the grave!

m11.description: Bodyslam: Attack: +Power + 2 vs. Toughness  :::  Damage: 1d8 + Power ::: Location: Grapple
m11.commentary: An old school move for an old school badass.

m12.description: People's Elbow: Attack: +Charisma vs. Will  :::  Damage: 1d12 + Will ::: Location: Grapple

m13.description: Big Splash: Attack: +Power + 2 vs. Fortitude  :::  Damage: 1d6 + Power ::: Location: Ropes
m13.commentary: Now that's what i call a splash!
